mapper.insert: insert into goods_table(goods_name, goods_price, goods_size, goods_detail, goods_type, goods_weight, goods_show_img, goods_tip, goods_tip_show, goods_code, goods_quality,create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{goodsName},#{goodsPrice},#{goodsSize},#{goodsDetail},#{goodsType},#{goodsWeight},#{goodsShowImg},#{goodsTip},#{goodsTipShow},#{goodsCode},#{goodsQuality},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update goods_table set goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, goods_detail = #{goodsDetail}, goods_type = #{goodsType}, goods_weight = #{goodsWeight}, goods_show_img = #{goodsShowImg}, goods_tip = #{goodsTip}, goods_tip_show = #{goodsTipShow}, goods_code = #{goodsCode}, goods_quality = #{goodsQuality}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from goods_table where goods_code like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') order by goods_weight desc
select * from goods_table where goods_tip != '' and goods_tip_show = 1 and goods_tip is not null order by goods_weight desc
